description: This file initializes a vector database with a PDF knowledge base, then creates an agent to interact with it and generate responses based on the knowledge.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and generates responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from specified PDF URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database implementation using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on the input question, optionally in markdown format.
